import React from 'react'; const LandingPage = ({ onLoginClick, onSignupClick }) => { const popularCuisines = [ { name: 'Italian', icon: 'üçù', description: 'Pasta, Pizza, Risotto' }, { name: 'Mexican', icon: 'üåÆ', description: 'Tacos, Enchiladas, Guacamole' }, { name: 'Indian', icon: 'üçõ', description: 'Curry, Biryani, Naan' }, { name: 'Chinese', icon: 'ü•¢', description: 'Dumplings, Stir-fry, Noodles' }, { name: 'Japanese', icon: 'üç±', description: 'Sushi, Ramen, Tempura' }, { name: 'Thai', icon: 'üçú', description: 'Pad Thai, Tom Yum, Green Curry' }, { name: 'Mediterranean', icon: 'ü•ô', description: 'Hummus, Falafel, Greek Salad' }, { name: 'American', icon: 'üçî', description: 'Burgers, BBQ, Apple Pie' } ]; return (

); }; export default LandingPage;
